Makoun is married and has four children, including Jean III Makoun, who followed his footstep to be a footballer. In April 2011, Makoun was given a compassionate leave by Aston Villa to return to Cameroon after his wife and one of his children were involved in a car crash. In addition to speaking French, Makoun also speaks English, learning the language from his time at Villa Park.
